website_summaries.verdict: A chemical skin tag removal solution that works well on small to medium skin tags while protecting surrounding skin.
pros: Liquid formula comes with an applicator that has an angled tip
Includes skin protector shields that make it easy to target specific areas
Made with chemicals that are proven to "freeze" off tags permanently
cons: Sometimes requires more than one treatment, and may not work on very large skin tags
May cause itching, burning, or irritation
Don't use if you are pregnant

customer_reviews.title: Compound W Tag remover
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return, product does not work! Used as instructed and very disappointed in the results. Used again, second time not any better results! For the price of this item you could do a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good, too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: In a smaller skin tag it worked with only 1 application. On a larger skin tag it took 2 applications. Good product, does what it is intended to but so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions and put sticker according to size of skin tag or wart your removing.
customer_reviews.text: I love it once I got the hang of removing my skin tags on neck.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a skin tag which still hasn’t fallen off after several applications I might have to go to a doctor. It was a waste of my money for sure
customer_reviews.author: Diana Boerninghaus

customer_reviews.title: A++ worked great for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical... But very happy with results... within a few days they feel off!! Much easier then seeing a doctor to remove.
customer_reviews.author: edward h

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that I didn’t have to apply multiple times a day (who wants to take a break from work to put some stuff on their neck?) One application and the waiting game started. The skin tag swelled significantly, which I didn’t expect. It was like a little balloon on my neck. I couldn’t find a lot of information on whether what was going on was normal. After that, it hardened overtime as it died and just fell off. So at the end of the day- I got what I wanted! One application, and no more skin tag!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: First time using home skin tag remover...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to rid of occasional pesky skin tags. My medical benefits doesn't cover this feature, therefore I'd be paying out of pocket for procedures and it's expensive. Product arrived as described, I opened the package, all contents were there and sealed properly. The directions were very easy to read and understand. I just completed my first treatment and will wait and see if the skin tag falls off. I was a little apprehensive about using a product like this outside of the medical office, but to may surprise it was easy, not intimidating to use. I'll check back if/when the skin tag falls off. Update- Skin tag did fall off naturally in less than two weeks. :)
customer_reviews.author: gail pierson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: Used this for small skin tags on my neck and armpit. Slight ache and burn, then as advertised they fell off and left no mark. Whole process took less than two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Missing the rings that protect your skin, tried it anyway. Difficult to use, I think it would have been difficult even with the rings. It just gave my skin a little frostbite, which I expected. Two tries and several uncomfortable weeks later, it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Product Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Had some skin tags and they slowly came off as the directions stated. Couple tags I had to apply to applications too, but worked and they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works if you like pain
customer_reviews.text: It got 4 stars because it worked on 2 of the 3 skin tags I trued it on. The 4th one I used it on was larger than the size you ate suppose to use this with which is does warn it wont work on them. So the product does work when used properly. However the directions aren't very clear as for how often to use it and how. I do not reccomend however unless you are desperste. This hurts. Even using the skin protectors they provide your skin will be sensitive and the skin tag itself will hurt. Be prepared to civer them with bandaids due to rubbing against them and them bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin Tags Gone!
customer_reviews.text: It will remove skin tags. Not too painful. The Pen version is better but ghis comes with O ring stckers so you don't burn you good skin around the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Horlacher

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.  Pretty neat.
customer_reviews.text: It works. The first skin tag I tried it on came off pretty quick. The other took several attempts over the course of about two weeks. It did save me the time of spending several hours at the docs office as well as the money saved.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Goddess

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Hubby bought it for large skin tag, I didn’t think it would work, I was wrong. Works great, easy to apply, he says it hurt a tiny bit the day after application but all in all he’s happy with the results and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Assuming a piece is missing Tried to improvise and of course didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Product was received open and minus some parts
customer_reviews.text: Product was received in a timely manner but the box was visibly sliced open and was missing the blue shield strips. Have not received any reply from the seller after sending an email. This skin tag remover had all the contents of the Compund W Freeze Off Wart Remover but at a much higher sale price. Not worth the price and would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: hurts like h*ll
customer_reviews.text: this stuff does NOT freeze off a skin tag, but it will make your skin feel like you've been holding ice to it for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen K. Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as having them removed at the doctor but a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.text: So I can't believe it, but this worked to remove 2 skin tags I had. One was on my back and the other under my arm. I had to have someone help me because of the location. No more painful than at the doctor and they both came off completely working a week.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Wish that it just spray like mist so that you don’t only have to use the sticks
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! My skin tag was completely gone within 9 days! Location of my skin tag was my upper thigh, so the stinging sensation was even more so than I expected. But definately worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: It works on actual tags. Not moles or warts. It stings because it’s freezing it off. Mine fell off in about 5 days. Not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Klizzle

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: The application process sucks. Had to apply many times, I even got a blister. I'll never try this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and missing items (not eligible for return)
customer_reviews.text: Received in a smashed box (top was crushed open- not sealed) and was missing the skin shield stickers. Completely unusable and not eligible for return (since it contains a “flammable liquid”). Don’t buy. I would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin J

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and worked great, got rid of the skin tags with one application. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. It just doesn’t work. Seems easy enough and is with the detailed instructions but bottom line, it doesn’t do anything. Very expensive for a product that does not do what it’s suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to remove a larger skin tag and it worked really well! Took a little longer than expected I think due to the size but I only needed one treatment to take care of it. Couldn't be happier to have it gone!
customer_reviews.author: Marie L

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: It takes over a week to work, but it worked and was better than a doctor visit
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rinkenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Just as it should be.
customer_reviews.text: I really havent had a chance to use it yet. But it arrived on time and exactly as it should be. So I have no expectation that it would not work as stated. I did finally use it. Took 2 applications to remove the skin tag.
customer_reviews.author: JO,EUGENE, OR.

customer_reviews.title: Returned Product
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product as the fine print says you can’t use it on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product's...
customer_reviews.text: ...was SO severe! It physically HURT my wif, during the application. Sad thing was it was more odf a product gimmick than anything else. The end results. EPIC FAIL!!! SAVE YOUR CASH!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Storm

customer_reviews.title: Crushed box and loose pieces everywhere.  no tape or tamper proof indicators on package
customer_reviews.text: Crushed and pieces loose all over in the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Irritating but it worked on my large skin tags.
customer_reviews.text: It worked! I had two large skin tags on my thigh. Very irritating. Anyways it took multiple freezings (perhaps three or four) and I didn’t wait two weeks in between as directed but it definitely killed them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jodocy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick after wasting money on other items.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Frizzell

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work just burnt my skin and was painful. Now I can’t return it because I did not keep pancaking g. My bad never again!
customer_reviews.author: marla gudiel

customer_reviews.title: How it works. Results
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use the the compound w skin tag removel but looks easy to use with no idea if woks . Thank for your interest in my response but it’s impossible at this time
customer_reviews.author: Rosalba Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was unable to use this 30.00 product due to the level of difficulty. Unfortunately it was far more intricate to use than presented.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bollman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on 3 different skin tags and none of them fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Jesse Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and it worked a lot quicker than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: Raynee Carlson

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: CW Skin Tag Removal actually works as well as your dermatologist's office. Application is easy and in a few days tag will fall off. I would recommend it to those who suffer outbreaks of skin tags in visible areas.
customer_reviews.author: TITI

customer_reviews.title: It’s stinks the tags but not removed them. Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product shrinks your skin tags but it won’t remove them as it advertised. I was hopping to remove at least one. It burns the first time and leave the the tags hanging by a thread for two weeks but they don’t fall off. When you sweat hurts badly. The liquid burn the head of the tags and you and they become small open wounds. I doesn’t do what it promises. I’m gonna try something else. I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Puente

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: This product does work well. Not immediate results keep in mind as the instructions state. But it will work with one application and may take up to 2 weeks for the tag to dry up and fall off. The price went up $12 in a month, but still cheaper than a Doctors visit for some. The larger price however may turn some buyers away. Depends how much the skin tag bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: Nanook

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly / Follow the directions exactly
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, it worked! It took one day to go away, I'm quite shocked. Mostly painless, easy. Just follow the directions carefully. I'm guessing that has a lot to do with whether or not it works or works quickly. You don't hit it straight on, you hit it where it connects to your regular skin and hold it there for 40 seconds. That's it. It probably helps it detach, not dissolve, which is what I expected until I read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This does take some dexterity to use. Since skin tags occur most commonly in adults, this is no small issue. I had a small tag that came off in one week and a large one that took two applications. Drawbacks, other than dexterity needed to apply, are the fact that it has to be covered for up to 6 weeks, if three applications are needed. And if near hair, like an armpit, pulls hair when removing tape or bandage. Lastly, I am nit a large guy and even my small tag required a large template. I can’t imagine needing a small or medium opening, comes with only 5 large sizes.
customer_reviews.author: REELDOC

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works if you are sure it’s a skin tag. It seriously stings momentarily but it just means you’re doing it right. It’s sore and a little irritated for a couple 3 or 4 days but it’s because it’s dying and then it falls off....HALLELUJAH!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical, but couldn't stand the thought of paying a doctor for skin tag removal, since I see to be prone to them. It really works well! I'm pleasantly surprised at how well!
customer_reviews.author: Becki Kapla

customer_reviews.title: Works great on multiple tags at a time
customer_reviews.text: The instructions tell you to treat one tag at a time but I've done as many as four. Apply the protective rings (which CAN be a little tricky for the small sized ones- try them on for size before removing the backing) to three or four tags. Prep the applicator, then apply it as directed to each tag in turn, rotating it a quarter turn each time. Remove the rings and one to two weeks later the tags are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: No use
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all. It hurts so much. But not removing anything
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I had big hopes for this product as I could feel it working when applying the compond. However even thou the skin tags were getting freeze burnt they never fell off On some of the skin tags I applied it three or more times but they never fell off What does work is tieing a string around the tags. They fall off whitin a week.
customer_reviews.author: MPW

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a medium-sized skin tag on my neck. It is almost gone! It did take two applications, but I am very pleased with the results. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works!! I had skin tags all over my neck, started showing up a few years ago. This took care of all of them. It does look brown for about 2 weeks and then just fall off! Thank goodness I decided to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just applied a week ago and it appears to be working. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. One use and the skin tag fell off in 2 days. I highly recommend this product>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Somtimes it works , sometimes not. But im very happy when it does. Sometimes can be very painfull., Sometimes little.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy at home remedy than a doctor visit
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Less painful then first initial thoughts to remove
customer_reviews.author: Nicolasa

customer_reviews.title: Works for large tags.
customer_reviews.text: Works for large tags. Tip too large for smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

product_meta.title: (CN) Compound W Skin Tag Remover - 8 CT, Compound W Traitement des Acrochordons - 8 CT
product_meta.description:
Compound W™ Skin Tag Remover.
New!
Dermatologist proven method.
Freeezes skin tags instantly for effective removal at home.
Precision tip applicator + Tag Target™ skin shield.
Pinpoints skin tag, protects healthy skin.
feature_bullets: It is the only do-it-yourself skin tag remover designed to treat skin tags while protecting the surrounding skin
Special TagTarget skin shields isolate the skin tag through a hole in the TagTarget center
The TagTarget adheres lightly to the surrounding healthy skin, protecting it and making it simple to target just the skin tag with the foam-tip applicator
It's specially designed to be easy to use, you can remove skin tags in the privacy of your own home

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
